settings.text: The Abramovici family's dedication to craftsmanship goes back at least three generations - more than 80 years. In the 1940s, Arie Abramovici was a highly sought-after watchmaker in Romania. Arie had his own watch and jewelry boutique for over 40 years and became a master craftsman within the industry.
